citeinfo.title: Land Cover & Land Use - 1988; LandCover88
citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 2015. Land Cover & Land Use - 1988; LandCover88. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed: 16 July 2015).

descript.abstract: Land use and land cover as interpreted from 1988 Aerial Photography for state of RI inclusive data set - RIGIS wetlands s44wwt91

idinfo.useconst: This dataset is provided 'as is.â€™ The producer(s) of this dataset, contributors to this dataset, the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium, the State of Rhode Island, and the University of Rhode Island do not make any warranties of any kind for this dataset, and are not liable for any loss or damage however and whenever caused by any use of this dataset. idinfo.datacred: Resource Mapping Center-UMASS at Amherst; RIGIS

attracc.attraccr: RIGIS standards 99 percent; visual inspection of overlays - no field checks

dataqual.logic: visual inspection of overlays - no field checks; visual inspection of overlays on Mylar originals
dataqual.complete: topologically complete arc-info polygon coverage; RIGIS standards rms-005 fuzzy-002

horizpa.horizpar: plus or minus 50 feet; visual inspection of overlays on Mylar originals

citeinfo.pubdate: 1988 b-w aerial photography; 1990 RIGIS wetlands and 1988 RIGIS roads
citeinfo.title: Aerial Photo's and GIS Coverages

srcinfo.srccontr: 1988 b-w aerial photography; 1990 RIGIS wetlands and 1988 RIGIS roads

procstep.procdesc: 1988 b-w aerial photography was interpreted and transferred with zts to 24000 mylar base registerer to USGS quad tics and manually digitized on tablet
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "John Stachelhaus" to "Nancy Hess."

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

procstep.procdesc: Converted E00 file to shapefile. First, imported E00 using the "Import from E00" tool; next, used the "Feature Class to Shapefile" to convert the coverage to a shapefile.

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center
